name: Haunted Gnome
text: You use your gnome magic to take on an eerie illusory appearance.
prerequisites: Cha 13, gnome magic racial trait, Knowledge (arcana) 1 rank.
benefit: You add haunted fey aspect (page 230) to your list of gnome magic spell-like abilities, and you can use this spell-like ability twice per day.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to use haunted fey aspect an additional time in a day.
text_zh: 你能用你的侏儒幻术制造令人毛骨悚然的幻象。
prerequisites_zh: 魅力13，【侏儒魔法】种族特性，知识（奥秘）1级。
benefit_zh: 将‘精怪之相（Haunted Fey Aspect, UC）’法术加入你的类法术能力列表中，你能每天使用这项类法术能力2次。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗5点耐力来在一天内额外使用一次精怪之相UC。
